text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You were all fired up during training again today, Suzuka-san! Trainer-san seemed really enthusiastic too!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I also want to aim higher, since Trainer-san wants to see that too.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Also, I'm entering the [Takarazuka Kinen] next.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Air Groove-san is participating too, isn't she? Finally, a showdown between rivals~! I'll definitely come cheer for you!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Oh, that's right! Suzuka-san, I'll give you another massage today! We can't have your fatigue carrying over in to tomorrow, after all!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hyaa~… Suzuka-san, your legs are as stiff as boards! I'm gonna have to massage the heck out of them!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No matter how much I run, it always feels like I can keep on going…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Whenever I'm running, I get the feeling that I'm not alone. Like there's a gentle push on my back that keeps guiding me forward.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, everyone in <Sirius>… and Trainer-san too, I wonder if it's because of all of you supporting me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe…! We'll all keep continuing to support Suzuka-san! That's why, Suzuka-san, keep showing us lots of your awesome running!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Alright! I'll keep massaging until your legs are all soft and squishy! I'll show you the strength I've built up from milking cows!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: C-cows…?
Silence Suzuka had a stunning victory during [Kinko Sho]. Even after that, her condition continued to improve.
For the sake of her next challenge, the [Takarazuka Kinen], I was headed to the training course when-
(rustle rustle)
(Eh…? W-what's going on…?! Why's it suddenly so dark…?!)
(Eh…? W-what's going on…?! Why's it suddenly so dark…?!)
Heave-ho, Heave-ho.
(Ehh, I'm being carried…? My mind can't keep up?!)
Welcome, Trainer. I sincerely welcome you.
W-…Where am I?! Who are you…?!
W-…Where am I?! Who are you…?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: My name is Agnes Tachyon. I just really wanted to have a chat, so I decided to have you accompany me.
A thin smile floated on to the lips of this Uma Musume named Agnes Tachyon. That burlap sack by her feet- did she carry me here in that?
A thin smile floated on to the lips of this Uma Musume named Agnes Tachyon. That burlap sack by her feet- did she carry me here in that?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Suspicious is a bit rude. While I agree I was perhaps a little rough, I do have a proper reason for inviting you here.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Truthfully, in regards to you and your disciple, Silence Suzuka-kun, I wanted to have a chat and ask a few questions.
A chat with us?
A chat with us?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Yes. Have you ever, at times, taken a moment to consider what kind of existence "Uma Musume" are?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: For example, have you ever wondered why, even though they are very similar to humans, they have much higher physical abilitiles?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Uma Musume still have many, many mysteries like that hidden within them. You see, I wish to unravel those mysteries, and so I continue to research these so called Uma Musume.
…the mysteries of Uma Musume and what kind of relationship they have to humans?
…the mysteries of Uma Musume and what kind of relationship they have to humans?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: With that exceptional speed, carrying herself from start to finish in such a way- What you are trying to achieve, has truly peaked my curiousity!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: If she continues like this and perfects that style, that could be enough to push us Uma Musume to the next stage.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: For this running-style hence unknown to Uma Musume to progress, are you both fully prepared? That is certainly what I would like to hear.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: …so what you are saying is, you are just doing extremely normal things?
It's not like we're doing any special training, and we're not doing anything unreasonable either.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: So you are not doing any super-human-like physical training, so that unknown running style we have glimpsed is just Suzuka-kun's unique qualities-

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: No, maybe we should start by thinking that some spiritual aspect is starting to have an effect on her physical body…
Some spiritual aspect…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Have you never heard this? Uma Musume are living beings who bear many "feelings" as they run.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In the central plaza, that 3 Goddess statue. Concerning that statue, there is a belief that it is a place where Uma Musume inherit these "feelings".

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: As a researcher, you may think it is an improper idealogy to entertain, however, I myself, am an Uma Musume-

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: There are times while I am running where I can feel it, this sensation of some unknown presence pushing me forward.
The things Agnes Tachyon is talking about, could they possibly be the hopes and support that Uma Musume respond to…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: No, pardon me… that is not the main issue at hand. But, if that is the case, it seems my plans are slightly off base.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: If I am correct, the future you both are bound for is… a little frightening.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: The running-style you two are aiming for is a big unknown. It is possible that it might be something outside the limits of what an Uma Musume can do.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In that case, at that time her legs…
The rest of those words never left Agnes Tachyon's lips. But what followed was definitely-
…will fail. Is that what you're saying?
…will fail. Is that what you're saying?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I do not know. I'm merely speculating about one possibility. Whether there is truly a limit or not, I do not know that either.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Like I told you at the beginning, Uma Musume are beings rife with mysteries. If I have made you feel uneasy, I apologize.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: At any rate, in regards to you and Suzuka-kun's astounding running-style- I have high hopes that you will show me what is in store for the next stage of Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Alllllright, next I'll be doing slope training, okay?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'm also doing slope training, and after that is straight line running, right?
Silence Suzuka is diligently training.
The contents of that training seems normal, no different from a normal Uma Musume.
But, her running-style is by no means normal, it's one-of-a-kind. What awaits at the end of that path-

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: The running-style you two are aiming for is a big unknown. It is possible that it might be something outside the limits of what an Uma Musume can do.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…?
Oh, uh yeah. Slope and straight line dashes are fine.
Oh, uh yeah. Slope and straight line dashes are fine.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Then, I'll be off.
Silence Suzuka's running style, is the ideal for Uma Musume.
A running-style that nobody else could realize, but put another way, a running style that only she can realize-
(Does that mean she'll eventually reach beyond the limits…?)
(Does that mean she'll eventually reach beyond the limits…?)
A slight uneasiness began to fill my heart, I desperately tried not to think about it.
